title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Plan A Field Trip
body: Plan A Field Trip       Use this page to find all the resources you need to plan an engaging, and different, educational experience for your students. You can learn more about Fort Larned and its history in the classroom by looking through our Photos & Multimedia and History & Culture sections.  The Curriculum Materials section includes lesson plans for classroom learning about Fort Larned. Before coming out, learn about how our Ticket to Ride grant can help pay for your transportation expenses. Schedule a Field Trip Schools must register in advance for a ranger-guided education programs at Fort Larned.    Please call 620-285-6911 or send an email to request a program.   Let us know the time and date of your visit, and an estimate of your group size. If you have any special requests or needs, please let us know in advance and we'll do our best to accommodate them.
